instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. threads.title: 820-00164 stuck on aplle logo
threads.message:
Hi there i got a problem with my machine 820-00164, before the board stuck on apple logo the board is NPO i just check u7600 is problem, i just replace and macbook is going to turn on but stuck on apple logo i must be reset PRAM(Command+Option+P+R) and macbook can log in to system

what should i do

thanks guys
